SoftwareType.Name: Test Software
SoftwareType.Description: This is part of a test mod. If you develop a perfect version, 50% of the population will want it, but 10% might randomly not want it.

Feature.Name: Test feat 1
Feature.Description: This feature will always be selected unless superseded by a feature with this as "From".

Feature.Name: Test feat 2
Feature.Description: This feature takes 6 months to make and has 4/6 Usability.

Feature.Name: Test feat 3
Feature.Description: This feature takes just as many artists as programmers and offers no stability.
